snippet.title: The Skyland Chronicles | Teaser
snippet.description:
#theskylandchronicles #game singleplayer

Steam - add to your wishlist now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2622460/The_Skyland_Chronicles/

"The Skyland Chronicles" is a dark fantasy, action-adventure RPG for a single player. The protagonist, Franco, finds himself reborn in a new world where he's often faced with a choice between two equally bad options at pivotal moments. Harnessing his pirate skills, Franco tries to fulfill his destiny while pondering whether this world is even worth saving.

Check out more on the official website: https://skylandchronicles.com

The game is based on the book "The Skyland Chronicles" by Mateusz Urantówka.

MFA GAMES is a Polish video game developer founded in 2022 by Mateusz Urantówka, the creator of "The Skyland Chronicles". The company is located in a city founded by Kazimierz the Great, a king of Poland who "found Poland wooden and left it made of stone". Every day, the MFA Games team draws inspiration while looking out the window at the castle of this great ruler.

Follow us:
Discord - https://discord.gg/3KvUhXM2wk
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/skylandchronicles/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/theskylandgame
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/@theskylandchronicles
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/TheSkylandChronicles/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100091898211826
